verb
  1. to change
  2. to convert to a particular faith
  3. to turn around an axis; to roll around
  4. to cross from one side to the other

noun
  1. clay pit; place from which pottery clay is obtained; quarry
  2. drainage ditch

intj
  1. used for a camel to make it kneel

character
  1. The second letter of the Pashto alphabet.

noun
  1. (obsolete, rare) arm
  2. a wooden long and rigid object on each of the four sides of a simple cot bed
